data.message: Hello  Facebook live person about  every other week  I  get  a restricted message ! It says I have to wait for 6 more day to post anything on my vw  sales  site, Nothing posted is illegal or contrary  to your rules !  How can i find out what i am doing to keep this from happening over and over?

replies.message: Hi Alan. It sounds like you may have overused a feature, even if you didn't mean to. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. In the meantime, you can learn more about our policies by reviewing the Facebook Community Standards: http://bit.ly/2jbvtCA. -Brittany
Can't you  remove the  restriction , so i can at least answer  questions
